name: Apocalyptica
description: '''Apocalyptica''' is a Finnish [[symphonic metal]] band from [[Helsinki]], formed in 1993. The band is currently composed of three classically trained [[cellists]] [[Eicca Toppinen]], [[Paavo Lötjönen]], and [[Perttu Kivilaakso]]. Originally a [[Classical music|classical-style]] [[Metallica]] tribute band, the band eventually adopted a [[neoclassical metal]] style without the use of conventional guitars and bass. They have sold over four million albums to date.
